name: proj
description: Project tracking and context management for AI-assisted development

chatParticipants.name: proj
chatParticipants.description: Project tracking assistant - query status, tasks, decisions, and log context

commands.name: log
commands.description: Log a decision, note, or blocker

commands.name: end
commands.description: End the current session with a summary

proj.cliPath.description: Full path to the proj CLI executable

proj.showStatusBar.description: Show proj status in the status bar

languageModelTools.name: proj_get_status
languageModelTools.description: Gets the current project status including active tasks, blockers, and recent decisions. Use this at the start of conversations to understand project context.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get current project tracking status including tasks, blockers, decisions, and session info. Call this to understand what the user is working on and what context exists.

languageModelTools.name: proj_log_decision
languageModelTools.description: Logs an architectural or design decision for future reference. Use when making technical choices.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Log a decision that was made during the conversation. Use when the user makes a technical choice, architectural decision, or picks between options. Include topic, the decision made, and the rationale.

topic.description: The topic or area of the decision (e.g., 'database', 'authentication', 'UI framework')

rationale.description: Why this decision was made (optional but recommended)

languageModelTools.name: proj_add_task
languageModelTools.description: Adds a new task to the project tracking system.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Add a task when the user identifies something that needs to be done, a TODO item, or work to complete later. Set priority based on urgency.

description.description: Description of the task to be done

languageModelTools.name: proj_log_blocker
languageModelTools.description: Logs a blocker that is preventing progress on the project.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Log a blocker when the user encounters something preventing progress - missing dependencies, waiting on external input, permissions issues, etc.

description.description: Description of what is blocking progress

languageModelTools.name: proj_log_note
languageModelTools.description: Logs a context note for future reference in a specific category.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Log important context that should be remembered for future sessions - constraints, requirements, findings, or other information worth preserving.

content.description: The full content of the note

languageModelTools.name: proj_update_task
languageModelTools.description: Updates the status of an existing task.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Update a task's status when work begins (in_progress), completes (completed), gets blocked (blocked), or is no longer needed (cancelled).

taskId.description: The numeric ID of the task to update

languageModelTools.name: proj_end_session
languageModelTools.description: Ends the current tracking session with a summary of what was accomplished.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: End the session when the user is done working or explicitly asks to end. Provide a concise summary of what was accomplished.

summary.description: Brief summary of what was accomplished in this session

languageModelTools.name: proj_search_context
languageModelTools.description: Searches project history for decisions, notes, and context about a specific topic.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search for past decisions, notes, and context about a topic. Use when the user asks about previous choices or when you need historical context.

topic.description: The topic to search for in project history

languageModelTools.name: proj_get_session_activity
languageModelTools.description: Gets all activity from the current session for generating an end-of-session summary.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get detailed activity from the current session including decisions made, tasks added/completed, blockers logged, and git commits. Use this before calling proj_end_session to generate an accurate summary of what was accomplished. Always call this first when the user wants to end their session, then use the activity to write a concise summary.
